content: **knitted head band with cable and neck warmer in drops alpaca and drops kid-silk or drops flora and drops kid-silk piece is knitted with rib and stocking stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the silver birch neck warmer pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-946 yarn group a + a or c ---------------------------------------------------------- * **for the entire set ** **size** s/m m/l l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-150-150 g colour 9020 light pearl grey and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-75-75 g colour 38 chalk or use drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 03 light grey and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50 g colour 38 chalk * **neck warmer ** **size** s/m m/l l/xl shoulder width approx 30-32-34 cm height without neck edge approx 24-26-28 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 9020 light pearl grey and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50 g colour 38 chalk or use drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 03 light grey and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50 g colour 38 chalk needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm for neck edge the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 2 strands = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/226-56-a-silver-birch-heabband
